sponsor.partnerMessage: As a maker, designer, or innovator, NWACC's Computer Aided Design program offers you the training to quickly transform your skills into an in-demand career in mechanical, architectural, or civil design. Courses are held in the college's Integrated Design Lab. Learn more at www.nwacc.edu/CAD.

posts.title: Arkansas Soccer And Volleyball Season Tickets On Sale Now
posts.content:
The Razorback Volleyball and Soccer teams are gearing up for another competitive season, and season tickets are now on sale so that you can catch these dynamic teams in action.

  • Bump, set, spike: The volleyball schedule has the Razorbacks home at Barnhill for 15 matches this season. General admission season tickets start at $40.
  • Kick it with the Hogs: The soccer squad will host 9 home matches, beginning with an exhibition vs. Kansas State on Aug 7. Season tickets are $25 for adults and $15 for children and include a newly designed scarf with purchase.

Keep up with Razorback Athletics HERE.

posts.title: Cool Jobs In NWA
posts.content:
Looking for a job? Check out the wide range of positions posted to our community board:

  • Join the innovative, human-centered automation company Ox as a Financial Analyst.
  • Drive key operational strategies as an Inventory Controller with Outdoor Cap.
  • Find several other listings in the Health, Education, and Retail industries.

Have a job you're looking to fill? Post it HERE.

posts.title: Celebrate Summer With $40 Tickets To Brothers Osborne At The Momentary
posts.content:
The Momentary is celebrating the start of summer with a flash sale on tickets to see Brothers Osborne perform on Jul 15.

  • Here's the duo: Brothers Osborne is a Grammy Award-winning country-rock duo whose unique sound has earned nine Grammy nominations, numerous CMA and ACM awards, and recognition as one of Nashville's most distinct acts.
  • Here's the deal: No discount code is needed for the sale. Just snag your $40 tickets online before the flash sale ends today at 10a.

Act fast! Buy your tickets HERE.

posts.title: Weekend Roundup
posts.content:
Happy Friday, Northwest Arkansas! Here's your Weekend Roundup:

  • ü§† Giddy-up: Catch the last two nights of the 78th annual Rodeo of the Ozarks at Parsons Stadium in Springdale with Rope Your Dreams Night on Friday, Jun 23, and Let Freedom Ring Night on Saturday, Jun 24.
  • üéûÔ∏è At the Dive In: Put on your swimsuit and inflate the floaties! Dive-In Movies at Wilson Park Pool kicks off this week with the Super Mario Bros. Movie on Friday, Jun 23, at 7:15p.
  • üö≤ Wheely cool: Siloam Springs will celebrate this month's Fourth Friday with the theme Bike Night at Memorial Park on Jun 23 from 4-8p.
  • ü´ê Berry nice: Gather your friends and family for the Fourth Annual Berry Fest at The Berry Farm in Bentonville on Saturday, Jun 24, from 2-7p! Btw, tickets are almost out!
  • üèÑ Float & flow: Learn how to paddleboard with instructors from Cocoon Yoga Lab during the Paddle & Play session at Lake Atalanta in Rogers this Saturday, Jun 23, from 4-5:30p.
  • üíê Bucket o' blossoms: Pick fresh flowers and build beautiful bouquets at Mount Olive Farms' Upick flower field, opening for the season this Saturday, Jun 24, from 8-11a.

Go have some fun!

posts.title: Start Your Independence Day Off By Running The Railyard
posts.content:
Get a running start to your Independence Day festivities at the 2nd Annual Run the Railyard 5K, hosted by the Rotary Club of Downtown Rogers at Railyard Bike Park on Jul 4 at 7:30a.

  • Come together: The Run the Railyard 5K raises funds for Rotary Club's beautification projects in Rogers's Parks and provides a family-friendly holiday event in Downtown Rogers.  
  • Bring the family: The 3.5-mi course is dog, child, and stroller friendly, so bring the whole family for a run/walk around Lake Atalanta. The first 100 finishers will receive medals, and trophies will be given to the fastest man, fastest woman, and fastest person up the hill.

Register before noon on Monday, Jun 26, and you'll get two Dugout Premium tickets to the Jul 5 Naturals game. Sign up HERE.

pick.content:
